full_text:
Thanks Bruce .. It sounds like your communication is "LIVE" and mine

Debbie



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> 
> Hi Debbie,
>  
> Yes I am most certainly getting and hearing messages, responses and 
answers in real time.
> I do verbalize my sessions, I ask questions and answer questions 
they may ask.
>  
> When you ask a question give at least ten seconds before you ask 
the next question.
> Our friends may not be able to catch the correct signal or radio 
fragment to answer
> immediatelly. Listen carefully during the time after a question and 
if it is answered and the 
> conditions are optimal, such as a good signal and strong response. 
you should hear the answer if not all 
> part of it in real time.
>  
> most of the time we miss the real time communication due to the 
speed of the sweep of the ammount of clutter the signal
> is producing. I work with only the AM band, I find it less crowded 
than FM and therefore easier to catch real time responses.
>  
> The yes, no and name responses are the easiest to hear real time. 
The main thing is to listen carefully for any words or 
> phrases that pertain to the question you have asked. Also when you 
do hear a real time communication, immediatelly
> repeat what was said. That gives varification when listening back 
to the recording that you did in fact hear it real time.
>  
> At first get yourself accustomed to listening for the simple yes, 
no answers and your ear will start to develop for seperating the 
> spirit communication from the radio noise.
>  
> I hope this helps.
>  
> Bruce
> Bruce Halliday
